bibl.title: Seeing the Whole Picture: Why Reading Greek Texts from Soknopaiou Nesos is not Enough.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
bibl.author: LIPPERT, Sandra L.

bibl.note: Soknopaiou Nesos offers the great chance to see the whole picture by including demotic material that provides insight into areas hardly or not at all covered by the Greek documentation. Encourages all researchers, be they demotists or papyrologists, to join forces and knowledge.
bibl.seg: LIPPERT Sandra L., Seeing the Whole Picture: Why Reading Greek Texts from Soknopaiou Nesos is not Enough.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 427-434, 7 figg.
